summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5932 for the improvement of East Pine Street from Evergreen Place to Madrona Drive; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by the reconstruction of pedestrian bridge; under Ordinance No. 78555, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
